item.hexcreate.create_staff.tooltip: This staff is both a Wrench and a Staff
hexcreate.page.dummy_spells.congrats: Accepts a player entity, tells them they are doing a good job and makes them look up.
hexcreate.page.dummy_actions.signum: Accepts a $(l:casting/101)number/$, returns -1 if it is negative, 0 if 0, 1 if positive.
hexcreate.page.create_spells.crush: Accepts an Item Entity and crushes it, as if it had passed through a pair of crushing wheels.
hexcreate.page.create_spells.wash: Accepts an Item Entity and washes it, as if it had passed in front of a fan blowing through water
hexcreate.page.create_spells.smelt: Accepts an Item Entity and smelts it, as if it had passed in front of a fan blowing through fire.
hexcreate.page.create_spells.press: Accepts an Item Entity and presses it, as if it had passed under a mechanical press.
hexcreate.page.create_spells.haunt: Accepts an Item Entity and haunts it, as if it had passed in front of a fan blowing through soul fire
